Class ScreenSaver

java.lang.Object
  org.jdesktop.jdic.screensaver.ScreensaverBase
      org.jdesktop.jdic.screensaver.SimpleScreensaver
          mcm.theater.ScreenSaver

public class ScreenSaver
extends org.jdesktop.jdic.screensaver.SimpleScreensaver

A ScreenSaver animates a Stage, whose Actors are created by the Director given to this Screensaver.

Author:
Monika Mevenkamp
